usage_notes.implementation: Use these as ChatGPT conversation starter prompts with engagement tracking
usage_notes.engagement_strategy: Prioritize high-engagement starters for new users
usage_notes.progression: Start with basic starters, unlock advanced ones as users level up
usage_notes.testing: Test each starter for conversation length and continuation rate
usage_notes.updates: Update based on engagement metrics and user feedback
usage_notes.viral_mechanics: Include shareable elements in high-scoring interactions
